typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		geo_merge as string,
		persons_tested_final as string,
		testing_rate_final as string,
		adj_testing_rate_final as string,
		persons_tested_pos_final as string,
		pos_testing_rate_final as string,
		adj_pos_testing_rate_final as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Region = iif(like(geo_merge,'Unincorporated -%'), "Unincorporated", iif(like(geo_merge,'Los Angeles -%'), "Los Angeles", "City"))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
